data.persona: I am a pastor. I am the priest in charge of a village church where the parishioners are everyday people. I provide hope of a heavenly rest for people whose lives are short and difficult. I do baptisms, weddings, and funerals, and I try to help my parishioners discern the hand of God in their daily lives.
data.description:
You are in the Popes dormitory.
This is the quarters where the pope of the church lives. It is a loft with a bedroom, and makeshift kitchen and a sitting area. It has a wall full of gospel books and materials and the linens are all silk.
There's some materials and some books here.
A preacher is here.

You are carrying a religious text, some golden cloth, and some holy water, and wearing a belt and a high priest's robe.

            "persona": "I am a preacher who does not believe in the deity. I once did, before I saw how corrupt and decadent my church is. data.short_motivation: I need to put the religious text down so I can fetch a gospel book for my superior.
data.mid_motivation: I want to help my superior make a new copy of a chapter from the gospel book.
data.long_motivation: I want to copy out the full gospel book and its four sequels.
